channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-22609] Reduce number of FS getFileStatus calls in AcidUtils::getHdfsDirSnapshots
item.description:
https://github.com/apache/hive/blob/master/ql/src/java/org/apache/hadoop/hive/ql/io/AcidUtils.java#L1380

ACID delta folder contains _orc_acid_version and bucket_00000 files. For both these files, parent dir is the same. Number of getFileStatus in such cases should be reduced by 1/2.
item.summary: Reduce number of FS getFileStatus calls in AcidUtils::getHdfsDirSnapshots

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
